00037 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00038 {
00039 
00040 /*! This class provides interfaces to read an array file. */
00041 class ArrayFileReader
00042 {
00043 public:
00044         /*! Constructor */
00045         ArrayFileReader();
00046 
00047         /*! Destructor */
00048         ~ArrayFileReader();
00049 
00050 protected:
00051         /*! The files version number. */
00052         std::wstring fileVersionNumber;
00053 
00054 public:
00055         /*! Reads the entire contents of the file.
00056          *
00057          * @param fileName The name of the array file to read.
00058          * @param arrayData The array data to read from the file.
00059          * @param headerOnly Flag to indicate that the header line should only be read.
00060          */
00061         bool Read(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_array::ArrayData &arrayData, bool headerOnly=false);
00062 
00063         /*! Determines if a file is of the specified type.
00064          *
00065          * @param fileName The name of the file to check.
00066          * @param dataTypeId An identifier to the type of data.
00067          * @return True if the file matches the type desired.
00068          */
00069         static bool IsFileType(const std::string &fileName, const affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType &dataTypeId);
00070 
00071         /*! The identifier of the type of data stored in the file.
00072          *
00073          * @param fileName The name of the file to check.
00074          * @return The identifier of the type of data.
00075          */
00076         static affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType DataTypeIdentifier(const std::string &fileName);
00077 };
00078 
00079 };
